text: Mu by’ukuri ba bandi bemeye (ubutumwa bwa Muhamadi), Abayahudi (abemeye ubutumwa bwa Musa ku gihe cye), Abanaswara (abemeye ubutumwa bwa Isa (Yesu) ku gihe cye) n’Abaswaabi’i (abagumye kuri kamere yabo yo kwemera Imana batagira idini bayobotse muri icyo gihe), (muri abo bose) abemeye Allah by’ukuri, bakemera umunsi w’imperuka ndetse bakanakora ibitunganye, abo bazagororerwa ibihembo kwa Nyagasani wabo, kandi nta bwoba ndetse nta n’agahinda bazagira
